thread.title: Democratic Debate Social Media Game 2016

author: Cosmopolitan.com
title: Democratic Debate Social Media Game 2016
text:
The first Democratic debate airs tonight at 8:30 p.m. on CNN . In the past, Cosmopolitan.com has provided you with drinking games to get you through the many hours of candidates trying to score points with voters. This time, you're on your own for alcohol (here are some ~sexy~ cocktails if you need ideas). Instead, you can participate in this social media game since you'll no doubt be on your phone through the entire thing anyway.
 ‚Äã1. Update an extremely long Snapchat story anytime someone brings up Hillary Clinton's email saga. Share Tweet Pin E-mail More from #CosmoVotes 20 articles How College Completely Changed Hillary Clinton's... Hillary Clinton Is No Longer a "Pumpkin Spice... Elizabeth Warren's Speech in Support of Black... Carly Fiorina Confronted by Angry Human Birth... 2. Tweet "YAAAAS" whenever a candidate touts his or her support for gun control. Share Tweet Pin E-mail 3. Keep an eye out the new Hot Debate Guy and Instagram a photo of the hottest person you see in the debate audience. Share Tweet Pin E-mail 4. Tweet this Beyonc√© GIF whenever candidates talk about a woman's right to choose. GIF Share Tweet Pin E-mail 5. ‚ÄãUse the fire emoji whenever anyone refers to the Bernie Sanders slogan "Feel the Bern."‚Äã Share Tweet Pin E-mail 6. Browse the #TrumpYourCat hashtag every time Donald Trump is mentioned‚Äã. Meowmeow with his Trump hair. üòÇ #cattrumping #trumpyourcat #cat #caturday #catsofinstagram
A photo posted by Jodi Lynne (@jlr2483) on Jul 11, 2015 at 2:12pm PDT
7. ‚ÄãLike the Cosmo and Cosmo Beauty & Style pages on Facebook. Because why not? You know you're going to get bored at some point. Share Tweet Pin E-mail ‚Äã8. Post your most gorgeous shot of nature on Instagram if a candidate talks about climate change‚Äã. Made it to #sundance!! I'll be instagramming from the @cosmopolitan handle this weekend so for majestic mountains and the occasional celeb pic, head over there! ‚ùÑÔ∏è‚õÑÔ∏è‚ù§Ô∏è

9. Put ‚Äãsticker hearts all over your selfies whenever a candidate expresses support for equal pay‚Äã. Share Tweet Pin E-mail Follow Lori , Amy , and Prachi on Twitter.
